pullRequest.body:
Show that an element of a commutative semiring is central iff the corresponding multiplication operator commutes with all multiplication operators

---

By **[Dependent Issues](https://github.com/z0al/dependent-issues)** (ðŸ¤–). Happy coding!
<!-- By Dependent Issues (Action) - DO NOT REMOVE -->

Also, I realized this:
https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/blob/5522fc375dfd18ea7496d18f560309e857582ca8/Mathlib/Algebra/Ring/CentroidHom.lean#L490
should just be `Subsemiring.center`

And this:
https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/blob/5522fc375dfd18ea7496d18f560309e857582ca8/Mathlib/Algebra/Ring/CentroidHom.lean#L466
You should be able to simply write: `(z : NonUnitalSubsemiring.center Î±)`

@mans0954 I pushed a change to reduce the diff. You were constantly opening and closing the `CentroidHom` namespace just in order to move two lemmas out of that namespace. In this case, it's better to de-namespace them by using the `_root_.` prefix.

:v: mans0954 can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.
